Element.Name: Specification identifier
Element.Description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms.

Element.Name: Business process type
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears, to enable the Buyer to process the Invoice in an appropriate way.

Element.Name: Invoice number
Element.Description: A unique identification of the Invoice.

Element.Name: Invoice issue date
Element.Description: The date when the Invoice was issued.

Element.Name: Payment due date
Element.Description: The date when the payment is due.

Element.Name: Invoice type code
Element.Description: A code specifying the functional type of the Invoice.

Element.Name: Invoice note
Element.Description: A textual note that gives unstructured information that is relevant to the Invoice as a whole.Such as the reason for any correction or assignment note in case the invoice has been factored.
Element.Value: Please note our new phone number 33 44 55 66

Element.Name: Value added tax point date
Element.Description: The date when the VAT becomes accountable for the Seller and for the Buyer in so far as that date can be determined and differs from the date of issue of the invoice, according to the VAT directive.

Element.Name: Invoice currency code
Element.Description: The currency in which all Invoice amounts are given, except for the Total VAT amount in accounting currency.

Element.Name: VAT accounting currency code
Element.Description: The currency used for VAT accounting and reporting purposes as accepted or required in the country of the Seller.

Element.Name: Buyer accounting reference
Element.Description: A textual value that specifies where to book the relevant data into the Buyer's financial accounts.

Element.Name: Buyer reference
Element.Description: An identifier assigned by the Buyer used for internal routing purposes.

Element.Name: DELIVERY OR INVOICE PERIOD
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information on the invoice period.

Element.Name: Invoicing period start date
Element.Description: The date when the Invoice period starts.

Element.Name: Invoicing period end date
Element.Description: The date when the Invoice period ends.

Element.Name: Value added tax point date code
Element.Description: The code of the date when the VAT becomes accountable for the Seller and for the Buyer.

Element.Name: Purchase order reference
Element.Description: An identifier of a referenced purchase order, issued by the Buyer.

Element.Name: Sales order reference
Element.Description: An identifier of a referenced sales order, issued by the Seller.

Element.Name: PRECEDING INVOICE REFERENCE
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information on one or more preceding Invoices.

Element.Name: Preceding Invoice number
Element.Description: The identification of an Invoice that was previously sent by the Seller.

Element.Name: Preceding Invoice issue date
Element.Description: The date when the Preceding Invoice was issued.

Element.Name: Despatch advice reference
Element.Description: An identifier of a referenced despatch advice.

Element.Name: Receiving advice reference
Element.Description: An identifier of a referenced receiving advice.

Element.Name: Tender or lot reference
Element.Description: The identification of the call for tender or lot the invoice relates to.

Element.Name: Contract reference
Element.Description: The identification of a contract.

Element.Name: ADDITIONAL SUPPORTING DOCUMENTS
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about additional supporting documents substantiating the claims made in the Invoice.

Element.Name: Invoiced object identifier, Supporting document reference
Element.Description: An identifier for an object on which the invoice is based, given by the Seller, or the supporting document.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Invoiced object identifier.

Element.Name: Document type code
Element.Description: Code "130" MUST be used to indicate an invoice object reference. Not used for other additional documents

Element.Name: Supporting document description
Element.Description: A description of the supporting document.

Element.Name: Attached document
Element.Description: An attached document embedded as binary object (BASE64) or sent together with the invoice.

Attribute.Name: Attached document Mime code
Attribute.Description: The mime code of the attached document.

Attribute.Name: Attached document Filename
Attribute.Description: The file name of the attached document

Element.Name: External document location
Element.Description: The URL (Uniform Resource Locator) that identifies where the external document is located.

Element.Name: Project reference
Element.Description: The identification of the project the invoice refers to.

Element.Name: SELLER
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about the Seller.

Element.Name: Seller electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the Seller's electronic address to which a business document may be delivered.

Attribute.Name: Seller electronic address identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Seller electronic address

Element.Name: Seller identifier, bank assigned creditor identifier
Element.Description: An identification of the Seller or a unique banking reference identifier of the Payee or Seller assigned by the Payee or Seller bank.

Attribute.Name: Seller identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Seller identifier. For bank assigned creditor identifier (BT-90), value MUST be "SEPA"

Element.Name: Seller trading name
Element.Description: A name by which the Seller is known, other than Seller name (also known as Business name).

Element.Name: SELLER POSTAL ADDRESS
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about the address of the Seller.

Element.Name: Seller address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in an address.

Element.Name: Seller address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Seller city
Element.Description: The common name of the city, town or village, where the Seller address is located.

Element.Name: Seller post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service.

Element.Name: Seller country subdivision
Element.Description: The subdivision of a country.

Element.Name: Seller address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Seller country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.

Element.Name: Seller VAT identifier, Seller tax registration identifier
Element.Description: The Seller's VAT identifier (also known as Seller VAT identification number) or the local identification (defined by the Seller’s address) of the Seller for tax purposes or a reference that enables the Seller to state his registered tax status
Mandatory element. For Seller VAT identifier (BT-31), use value “VAT”, for the seller tax registration identifier (BT-32), use != "VAT"

Element.Name: Seller name
Element.Description: The full formal name by which the Seller is registered in the national registry of legal entities or as a Taxable person or otherwise trades as a person or persons.

Element.Name: Seller legal registration identifier
Element.Description: An identifier issued by an official registrar that identifies the Seller as a legal entity or person.

Attribute.Name: Seller legal registration identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Seller legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: Seller additional legal information
Element.Description: Additional legal information relevant for the Seller.

Element.Name: SELLER CONTACT
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing contact information about the Seller.

Element.Name: Seller contact point
Element.Description: A contact point for a legal entity or person.

Element.Name: Seller contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Seller contact email address
Element.Description: An e-mail address for the contact point.

Element.Name: BUYER
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about the Buyer.

Element.Name: Buyer electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the Buyer's electronic address to which a business document should be delivered.

Attribute.Name: Buyer electronic address identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Buyer electronic address.

Element.Name: Buyer identifier
Element.Description: An identifier of the Buyer.

Attribute.Name: Buyer identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Buyer identifier.

Element.Name: Buyer trading name
Element.Description: A name by which the Buyer is known, other than Buyer name (also known as Business name).

Element.Name: BUYER POSTAL ADDRESS
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about the postal address for the Buyer.

Element.Name: Buyer address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in an address.

Element.Name: Buyer address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Buyer city
Element.Description: The common name of the city, town or village, where the Buyer's address is located.

Element.Name: Buyer post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service.

Element.Name: Buyer country subdivision
Element.Description: The subdivision of a country.

Element.Name: Buyer address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Buyer country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.

Element.Name: Buyer VAT identifier
Element.Description: The Buyer's VAT identifier (also known as Buyer VAT identification number).
Mandatory element. Use “VAT”

Element.Name: Buyer name
Element.Description: The full name of the Buyer.

Element.Name: Buyer legal registration identifier
Element.Description: An identifier issued by an official registrar that identifies the Buyer as a legal entity or person.

Attribute.Name: Buyer legal registration identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Buyer legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: BUYER CONTACT
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing contact information relevant for the Buyer.

Element.Name: Buyer contact point
Element.Description: A contact point for a legal entity or person.

Element.Name: Buyer contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Buyer contact email address
Element.Description: An e-mail address for the contact point.

Element.Name: PAYEE
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about the Payee, i.e. the role that receives the payment.

Element.Name: Payee identifier, bank assigned creditor identifier.
Element.Description: An identifier for the Payee, or a unique banking reference identifier of the Payee or Seller assigned by the Payee or Seller bank.

Attribute.Name: Payee identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the payee identifier. For bank assigned creditor identifier (BT-90), value MUST be "SEPA"

Element.Name: Payee name
Element.Description: The name of the Payee.

Element.Name: Payee legal registration identifier
Element.Description: An identifier issued by an official registrar that identifies the Payee as a legal entity or person.

Attribute.Name: Payee legal registration identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Payee legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: SELLER TAX REPRESENTATIVE PARTY
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about the Seller's tax representative.

Element.Name: Seller tax representative name
Element.Description: The full name of the Seller's tax representative party.

Element.Name: SELLER TAX REPRESENTATIVE POSTAL ADDRESS
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about the postal address for the tax representative party.

Element.Name: Tax representative address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in an address.

Element.Name: Tax representative address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Tax representative city
Element.Description: The common name of the city, town or village, where the tax representative address is located.

Element.Name: Tax representative post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service.

Element.Name: Tax representative country subdivision
Element.Description: The subdivision of a country.

Element.Name: Tax representative address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Tax representative country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.

Element.Name: Seller tax representative VAT identifier
Element.Description: The VAT identifier of the Seller's tax representative party.
Mandatory element. Use “VAT”

Element.Name: DELIVERY INFORMATION
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about where and when the goods and services invoiced are delivered.

Element.Name: Actual delivery date
Element.Description: The date on which the delivery is made.

Element.Name: Deliver to location identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the location at which the goods and services are delivered.

Attribute.Name: Deliver to location identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Deliver to location identifier.

Element.Name: DELIVER TO ADDRESS
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about the address to which goods and services invoiced were or are delivered.

Element.Name: Deliver to address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in an address.

Element.Name: Deliver to address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Deliver to city
Element.Description: The common name of the city, town or village, where the deliver to address is located.

Element.Name: Deliver to post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service.

Element.Name: Deliver to country subdivision
Element.Description: The subdivision of a country.

Element.Name: Deliver to address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Deliver to country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.

Element.Name: Deliver to party name
Element.Description: The name of the party to which the goods and services are delivered.

Element.Name: PAYMENT INSTRUCTIONS
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about the payment.

Element.Name: Payment means type code
Element.Description: The means, expressed as code, for how a payment is expected to be or has been settled.

Attribute.Name: Payment means text
Attribute.Description: The means, expressed as text, for how a payment is expected to be or has been settled.

Element.Name: Remittance information
Element.Description: A textual value used to establish a link between the payment and the Invoice, issued by the Seller.

Element.Name: PAYMENT CARD INFORMATION
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about card used for payment contemporaneous with invoice issuance.

Element.Name: Payment card primary account number
Element.Description: The Primary Account Number (PAN) of the card used for payment.
Mandatory element. Use card Network identifier.

Element.Name: Payment card holder name
Element.Description: The name of the payment card holder.

Element.Name: CREDIT TRANSFER
Element.Description: A group of business terms to specify credit transfer payments.

Element.Name: Payment account identifier
Element.Description: A unique identifier of the financial payment account, at a payment service provider, to which payment should be made.

Element.Name: Payment account name
Element.Description: The name of the payment account, at a payment service provider, to which payment should be made.

Element.Name: Payment service provider identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the payment service provider where a payment account is located.

Element.Name: DIRECT DEBIT
Element.Description: A group of business terms to specify a direct debit.

Element.Name: Mandate reference identifier
Element.Description: Unique identifier assigned by the Payee for referencing the direct debit mandate.

Element.Name: Debited account identifier
Element.Description: The account to be debited by the direct debit.

Element.Name: Payment terms
Element.Description: A textual description of the payment terms that apply to the amount due for payment (Including description of possible penalties).

Element.Name: DOCUMENT LEVEL ALLOWANCES AND CHARGES
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about allowances applicable to the Invoice as a whole. A group of business terms providing information about charges and taxes other than VAT, applicable to the Invoice as a whole.
Mandatory element. Use “true” when informing about Charges and “false” when informing about Allowances.

Element.Name: Document level allowance reason code
Element.Description: The reason for the document level allowance or charge, expressed as a code.

Element.Name: Document level allowance reason
Element.Description: The reason for the document level allowance or charge, expressed as text.

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge percentage
Element.Description: The percentage that may be used, in conjunction with the document level allowance base amount, to calculate the document level allowance or charge amount.

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge amount
Element.Description: The amount of an allowance or a charge, without VAT.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge base amount
Element.Description: The base amount that may be used, in conjunction with the document level allowance or charge percentage, to calculate the document level allowance or charge amount.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge VAT category code
Element.Description: A coded identification of what VAT category applies to the document level allowance or charge.

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge VAT rate
Element.Description: The VAT rate, represented as percentage that applies to the document level allowance or charge.
Mandatory element. Use “VAT”

Element.Name: Invoice total VAT amount
Element.Description: The total VAT amount for the Invoice.

Element.Name: Invoice total VAT amount in accounting currency
Element.Description: The VAT total amount expressed in the accounting currency accepted or required in the country of the Seller.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5 or BT-6.

Element.Name: VAT BREAKDOWN
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about VAT breakdown by different categories, rates and exemption reasons

Element.Name: VAT category taxable amount
Element.Description: Sum of all taxable amounts subject to a specific VAT category code and VAT category rate (if the VAT category rate is applicable).

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5 or BT-6.

Element.Name: VAT category tax amount
Element.Description: The total VAT amount for a given VAT category.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5 or BT-6.

Element.Name: VAT category code
Element.Description: Coded identification of a VAT category.

Element.Name: VAT category rate
Element.Description: The VAT rate, represented as percentage that applies for the relevant VAT category.

Element.Name: VAT exemption reason code
Element.Description: A coded statement of the reason for why the amount is exempted from VAT.

Element.Name: VAT exemption reason text
Element.Description: A textual statement of the reason why the amount is exempted from VAT or why no VAT is being charged
Mandatory element. Use “VAT”

Element.Name: DOCUMENT TOTALS
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing the monetary totals for the Invoice.

Element.Name: Sum of Invoice line net amount
Element.Description: Sum of all Invoice line net amounts in the Invoice.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5.

Element.Name: Invoice total amount without VAT
Element.Description: The total amount of the Invoice without VAT.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5.

Element.Name: Invoice total amount with VAT
Element.Description: The total amount of the Invoice with VAT.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5.

Element.Name: Sum of allowances on document level
Element.Description: Sum of all allowances on document level in the Invoice.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5.

Element.Name: Sum of charges on document level
Element.Description: Sum of all charges on document level in the Invoice.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5.

Element.Name: Paid amount
Element.Description: The sum of amounts which have been paid in advance.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5.

Element.Name: Rounding amount
Element.Description: The amount to be added to the invoice total to round the amount to be paid.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5.

Element.Name: Amount due for payment
Element.Description: The outstanding amount that is requested to be paid.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5.

Element.Name: INVOICE LINE
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information on individual Invoice lines.

Element.Name: Invoice line identifier
Element.Description: A unique identifier for the individual line within the Invoice.

Element.Name: Invoice line note
Element.Description: A textual note that gives unstructured information that is relevant to the Invoice line.

Element.Name: Invoiced quantity
Element.Description: The quantity of items (goods or services) that is charged in the Invoice line.

Attribute.Name: Invoiced quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the invoiced quantity.

Element.Name: Invoice line net amount
Element.Description: The total amount of the Invoice line.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5.

Element.Name: Invoice line Buyer accounting reference
Element.Description: A textual value that specifies where to book the relevant data into the Buyer's financial accounts.

Element.Name: INVOICE LINE PERIOD
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about the period relevant for the Invoice line.

Element.Name: Invoice line period start date
Element.Description: The date when the Invoice period for this Invoice line starts.

Element.Name: Invoice line period end date
Element.Description: The date when the Invoice period for this Invoice line ends.

Element.Name: Referenced purchase order line reference
Element.Description: An identifier for a referenced line within a purchase order, issued by the Buyer.

Element.Name: Invoice line object identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for an object on which the invoice line is based, given by the Seller.

Attribute.Name: Invoice line object identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Invoice line object identifier.

Element.Name: INVOICE LINE ALLOWANCES OR CHARGES
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about allowances or charges applicable to the individual Invoice line.
Mandatory element. Use “true” when informing about Charges and “false” when informing about Allowances

Element.Name: Invoice line allowance or charge reason code
Element.Description: The reason for the Invoice line allowance or charge, expressed as a code.

Element.Name: Invoice line allowance or charge reason
Element.Description: The reason for the Invoice line allowance or charge, expressed as text.

Element.Name: Invoice line allowance or charge percentage
Element.Description: The percentage that may be used, in conjunction with the Invoice line allowance or charge base amount, to calculate the Invoice line allowance or charge amount.

Element.Name: Invoice line allowance or charge amount
Element.Description: The amount of an allowance or charge, without VAT.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5.

Element.Name: Invoice line allowance or charge base amount
Element.Description: The base amount that may be used, in conjunction with the Invoice line allowance or charge percentage, to calculate the Invoice line allowance or charge amount.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory attribute. Use BT-5.

Element.Name: ITEM INFORMATION
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about the goods and services invoiced.

Element.Name: Item description
Element.Description: A description for an item.

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: A name for an item.

Element.Name: Item Buyer's identifier
Element.Description: An identifier, assigned by the Buyer, for the item.

Element.Name: Item Seller's identifier
Element.Description: An identifier, assigned by the Seller, for the item.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: An item identifier based on a registered scheme.

Attribute.Name: Item standard identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item standard identifier

Element.Name: Item country of origin
Element.Description: The code identifying the country from which the item originates.

Element.Name: Item classification identifier
Element.Description: A code for classifying the item by its type or nature.

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item classification identifier

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier version identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme version identifier of the Item classification identifier

Element.Name: LINE VAT INFORMATION
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about the VAT applicable for the goods and services invoiced on the Invoice line.

Element.Name: Invoiced item VAT category code
Element.Description: The VAT category code for the invoiced item.

Element.Name: Invoiced item VAT rate
Element.Description: The VAT rate, represented as percentage that applies to the invoiced item.
Mandatory element. Use “VAT”

Element.Name: ITEM ATTRIBUTES
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about properties of the goods and services invoiced.

Element.Name: Item attribute name
Element.Description: The name of the attribute or property of the item.

Element.Name: Item attribute value
Element.Description: The value of the attribute or property of the item.

Element.Name: PRICE DETAILS
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about the price applied for the goods and services invoiced on the Invoice line.

Element.Name: Item net price
Element.Description: The price of an item, exclusive of VAT, after subtracting item price discount.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory element. Use BT-5.

Element.Name: Item price base quantity
Element.Description: The number of item units to which the price applies.

Attribute.Name: Item price base quantity unit of measure code
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the Item price base quantity.

Element.Description: Mandatory element. Use “false”

Element.Name: Item price discount
Element.Description: The total discount subtracted from the Item gross price to calculate the Item net price.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory element. Use BT-5.

Element.Name: Item gross price
Element.Description: The unit price, exclusive of VAT, before subtracting Item price discount.

Attribute.Description: Mandatory element. Use BT-5.
